tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Against All Enemies
programme.desc: Harm, Mac and Bud board an aircraft carrier in the Sea of Japan to investigate the accidental shooting down of a North Korean civilian airliner by Navy jets.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Impact
programme.desc: Harm and Bud investigate the crash of a Marine helicopter whose dead pilot is being blamed for the incident. They discover the chopper seems to have been hit by some form of UFO. Government security officials want to maintain a cover-up at all costs.(n)

programme.title: JAG: People V. Rabb
programme.desc: Harm is arrested by the FBI for the murder of Konaplanik, a Russian who was selling Harm supposedly accurate information about his missing father's whereabouts. The killer turns out to be Col. Tomashevsky, a Russian agent.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Defensless
programme.desc: A woman Navy ensign shoots and kills a Turkish colonel; she claims self-defense.(n)

programme.title: JAG: With Intent to Die
programme.desc: With help from Harm, Mac, Harriet, and Bud, Admiral Chedwiggen investigates the apparent suicide of his mentor, Admiral Clancy, who allegedly shot himself while on a hunting trip. Harm and company ultimately uncover who the killer was.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Broken Wind
programme.desc: While on a mission to repair a turbine at a wind farm, Team Scorpion must race to save Paige and Happy before the cable holding the gondola they are in snaps and sends them plummeting to the ground.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Rock Block
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must defy the orders of a foreign government after they retrieve an asteroid from space containing DNA strands that could have deadly consequences once exposed.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Strife on Mars
programme.desc: Team Scorpion gets trapped inside a failing and dangerous biodome designed for Mars while trying to extract a pair of scientists inside.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Something Burrowed, Something Blew
programme.desc: Team Scorpion helps Toby and Happy race to the altar to say "I Do" after a simple job extinguishing a tunnel fire becomes catastrophic.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Maroon 8
programme.desc: While en route to Toby and Happy's honeymoon, Team Scorpion's plane crash lands on a remote deserted island, leaving them all with little hope for rescue.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Scorp Family Robinson
programme.desc: Three weeks after they crash land on a deserted island, tensions run high for Team Scorpion when they must battle to overcome their relationship obstacles with each other in order to be rescued.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: With the night getting ever more active and poltergeist activity growing, something seems to target one of the team. And what activity could make Glen state ‘’that is paranormal’’.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Tired from this long investigation, the team continue where one of them realises that the idea to investigate along was a mistake, but can the others get there in time. And something has a final message for the team as they leave.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Beaumanor Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures, alone, to the upper floors of this large mansion and id stalked by something that wants to be heard.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Armely Mills Cottage
programme.desc: The cottage on the site of Armley Mills is said to be full of paranormal activity so Karl decides to enter, alone and witnesses something that is eager to grab his attention.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall
programme.desc: Yvette takes Glen and Mary into the incredibly haunted Bishton Hall. They start in the upper floors and work their way down to the cellars, but is something following them.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P1
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house and seems to be pulled in different directions from an unexplained energy.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl ventures down into the cellars of this large country house and soon comes under attack from an unseen force.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: There Ghosts The Neighborhood
programme.desc: TAPSis called out to Joplin, Missouri to help 3 generations of afamilyliving on one haunted estate! Could both houses on the property harbor entities that couldbring harm to their children?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to investigate a historic armory. An upcoming renovation has those involved fearful the construction might provoke lingering spirits attached to artifacts with documented violent pasts.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Empire State Haunt
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Taps heads to Fort William Henry located in Lake George, New York, where Ghost Hunters Academy winner Adam Berry joins the team.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 9
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and his new Commonwealth fleet take on the Drago-Kazov fleet but find it much larger than expected.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Magog eggs in Harper are starting to hatch, so the team builds a Teseract machine.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan takes over a tourist barge in an attempt to escape mercenaries.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Be All My Sins Remembered
programme.desc: A body identification goes awry when it turns out Beka's former crewmate isn't dead at all.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Dance of the Mayflies
programme.desc: Andromeda rescues dying people from a drift, but they soon turn into zombies being controlled by a hive-mind.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: In Heaven Now Are Three
programme.desc: The engine of creation is capable of rewriting the universe according to the owner's wishes. Dylan, Beka and Trance must obtain it before someone with dark plans gets it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.123
programme.desc: Navy woman unaware of boyfriend's girlfriend loans $3,000 for car rims; man admits drunken stupor caused furniture damage.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.79
programme.desc: A teenager puts his father in a choke-hold to demonstrate how he allegedly assaulted another boy at school who passed out cold and is suing for medical expenses/Two young women accuse an ex-friend of breaking their door down.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.3
programme.desc: A mother confesses to buying alcohol for underage teens who get drunk, throw rocks at cars and are ordered to pay $18,000 in restitution/Court fines for selling cigarettes to a minor are disputed by feuding sisters.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.50
programme.desc: Man alleges assault by ex-fiancée, sues for damages and unpaid loan for her schooling/Former live-in lover sues estranged husband for over $4,000 in personal loans and child support.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.214
programme.desc: A man's parole is at risk due to possession charges. He's sued for jail calls and accused of selling fake jewelry. A man sues his niece's friend for allegedly damaging his car at a party.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.9
programme.desc: An Escalade rental for a group of partying teenagers ends in a lawsuit between a limo company and a frustrated mother who claims she was lied to by the owner.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.85
programme.desc: Two men sue former friends for having them falsely arrested for assault and for making terrorist threats/A woman claims she threw a lawn chair at two men in self-defense; she and her husband sue them for alleged threats and moneyowed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.217
programme.desc: A woman's Disneyland trip after a concussion weakens her lost wages claim. Another woman discovers her fiancé's hidden child while he's incarcerated, leading to property disputes.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.147
programme.desc: Teen accused of car vandalism; alleges pepper spray incident. Teen uses loan for stepfather's rims; sues for repayment and totaled car balance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.59
programme.desc: Horseplay at party leads to children pushed into pool, parents argue over damaged iPod and ruined hairdo. Woman sues daughter for eleven car payments on 2000 Ford Escort; daughter, mother of four, cites no expectation of repayment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.76
programme.desc: Breast feeding a child while taking Vicodin is the accusation laid\t\t\t\r\nagainst a woman whose husband is being sued by a former friend\t\t\t\r\nfor an unpaid loan/A man accidentally kicks a female co-worker in the head while goofing around in the office.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon reunites the contenders with their loved ones before challenging them to jazz up some basic cuts of meat.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A team of previous winners returns to challenge the remaining contestants; each team designs its own menus for dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final five chefs must impress tough critics with a gourmet burger; a huge misstep brings dinner service to a halt; one chef is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With the grand finale just around the corner, the remaining chefs are challenged to replicate a sample dish using taste, texture and sight alone. The winner is rewarded with a $1,000 shopping spree before another taxing evening service begins.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay presides over the penultimate episode of the US cooking competition as this year's explosive series nears its climax. Three contestants soon become two as Gordon names the second finalist.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay presides over the final episode of the US cooking competition as this year's explosive series reaches its climax. Gordon informs Mary and Ja'Nel that their teams will be creating dishes for two tables of celebrity diners.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Call for Help
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt go to a garden center to repo a forklift, but a language barrier causes chaos. Matt and Froy are in danger when Froy refuses to call the cops on a gun-wielding debtor.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Big Letdown
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Waiting Game
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Knife Week
programme.desc: While Froy waits on news from his lawyer about his warrant in Texas, he considers taking matters into his own hands. Lou and Froy bust some slick moves in an attempt to wrangle a car from a debtor who is prepared to battle. Then, when one woman behaves...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Think, Adapt and Attack
programme.desc: Matt and Froy head to Texas to clear Froy's name, but things take a turn for the worse and Froy finds himself in more trouble than he can handle. Back in LA, Lou and Lyndah repo a car from a deceptive charity worker, and Lou is left to protect...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Cement Mixer
programme.desc: When a debtor and his friends resort to baseball bats, chaos erupts, and Lou, Lyndah, and Sonia fight not only with them but also with each other. Down in Texas, Matt and Froy wait to clear up Froy's warrant and get in way over their heads working...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Kids
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer’s plans for a romantic weekend fall apart after they argue about their different feelings toward careers, finances, and kids. Meanwhile, Audrey is having second thoughts about why she and Jeff have waited so long to have children.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Game on
programme.desc: After Adam buys an expensive video-game console, Jennifer makes him promise to discuss major purchases first, but Russell interferes and makes Adam question the agreement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Wooby
programme.desc: Audrey surprises Jeff by making quilt out of his old t-shirts but regrets her gift when he doesn't stop telling the stories that are behind the shirts.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mr. Fix-It
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey tackle marital communication issues while Adam and Jennifer discover whether creating a home-made 'videotape' will spice up their love life.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Adam enjoys stealing the attention of Russell's female admirers, prompting fiance Jennifer to lay down the law and Russell to seek revenge. Meanwhile, Jeff learns an important lesson about sleep deprivation.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Sister
programme.desc: A surprise visit from Audrey's sister Barbara opens a window of opportunity for Russell to prove that beauty is more than what meets the eye - or at least a function of personality and good strategy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Guy Code
programme.desc: In an effort to beef up their social agenda, Audrey persuades Jeff to double-date, which inadvertently puts the rules governed by the 'guy code' versus the 'marriage code' to the test.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Engagement Party
programme.desc: In an effort to capitalize on his commitment to Jennifer, Adam convinces Jeff to host an engagement party, which ultimately provides a lesson in 'giving' and 'receiving.' Audrey gains an unsolicited insight into her sister Barbara's single life.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bag Ladies
programme.desc: Russell realizes the cost of dating a 'bag lady,' while Adam experiences the social peril of yielding to Jennifer's wishes and sporting a 'man bag.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old School Jeff
programme.desc: Jeff is given an opportunity to 'live it up' during a night out on the town, landing Russell in hot water and Adam to reflect on the details surrounding his impending nuptials.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fix-Ups and Downs
programme.desc: Jennifer and Audrey practice their match-making skills and inadvertently end up date-less while Adam and Jeff score financial gain in the process. Meanwhile, Russell tries a new tactic at 'fixing himself up.'.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rain Check
programme.desc: For Dog and Beth it's not only another day in paradise, it's their anniversary. Beth is hoping for a romantic dinner with her man, but she knows only too well that for Dog work always comes first.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Let It Snow
programme.desc: Christopher is barely 21, already has a history of domestic abuse and assault, and is facing major time in a room without a view. This hunt won't be easy for Dog - the leads are few, informers and family are not forthcoming.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jack & Jill
programme.desc: Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.sub-title: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.(n)

programme.title: Dominion
programme.desc: In just FIVE days the world we know will change forever with devastating results. Jaelen an observer from another planet searches to find and rescue the human woman he fell in love with before it all happens.(n)

programme.title: Taking Earth
programme.desc: The human race is thrown into chaos when an alien invasion takes place. But the aliens have arrived for a very specific reason - to find the one boy out of 7 billion people who holds the power to destroy them.(n)

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.(n)

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.(n)

programme.title: Crank 2 High Voltage
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel, hitman Chev Chelios (Statham) launches himself on an electrifying chase through Los Angeles in pursuit of the Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart.(n)

programme.title: A Boy Called Sailboat
programme.desc: A small family finds hope in their extraordinary son named Sailboat when a personal gesture awakens a global desire.(n)

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: A dramatization of the April 2010 disaster, when an oil well called Deepwater Horizon exploded causing the worst spill in US history.(n)

programme.title: Dead Zone
programme.desc: An elite team of soldiers who, to stop the collapse of humanity, descend on a radiation-poisoned town and perform the ultimate stealth mission using high-tech armor and weapons.(n)

programme.title: Union Bound
programme.desc: Union Bound is a thrilling Civil War film that shows the strength and courage of the human spirit. Sergeant Joseph Hoover went to war to preserve the Union but finds himself captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: From director of action blockbuster Lethal Weapon, Richard Donner. Personal demons put cop Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard) at rock bottom but he wasn’t about to let a witness be murdered on his watch.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Mississippi
programme.desc: Photographer Holly returns to Gulfport, Mississippi for Christmas. Their traditional holiday light show has been revived again since a hurricane struck five years earlier. She is shocked to learn the festival is run by her high school sweetheart, Mike.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Karen
programme.desc: Karen is an entitled middle-aged woman whose demanding nature has alienated her loved ones. After a series of instances displaying her privilege, Karen receives an intervention from some unconventional spirits.(n)

programme.title: A Screenshot to Santa
programme.desc: In this holiday family film, two sisters left home alone on December 23rd overcome their sibling rivalry as they stave off would-be intruders.(n)

programme.title: Kill The Irishman
programme.desc: Oscar®-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.(n)

programme.title: A Thousand Kisses Deep
programme.desc: An unsettling drama that cinematically captures and recreates the psycho-analytic experience. Starring: Jodie Whittaker, Emilia Fox, Dougray Scott.(n)

programme.title: American Exit
programme.desc: A dying father takes a road trip with his son, to try to rebuild his relationship before he dies.(n)

programme.title: French Silk
programme.desc: In steamy New Orleans, a police detective doesn't know whether to arrest his prime suspect or make love to her after he unexpectedly finds himself in a passionate affair with an accused killer.(n)

programme.title: Witless Protection
programme.desc: A small-town lawman (Larry the Cable Guy) and the FBI witness (Ivana Milicevic) that he has in custody grapple with crooked federal agents, quack doctors and Chicago high-society.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: A madman forces young friends to kill one another to try to survive a sadistic game.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy: Sword of Storms
programme.desc: A possessed professor dispatches several creatures to retrieve a powerful sword held by Hellboy (Ron Perlman).(n)

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: On Luce Price's first day at the Sword & Cross boarding school, her attention is captured by the strangely familiar Daniel Grigori. She soon discovers he is a fallen angel who has battled over her for centuries.(n)

programme.title: One Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California. Starring: Marlon Brando, Karl Malden, Pina Pellicer.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Stubborn Mule Hill
programme.desc: The man Kit Carson saved from death in the desert turns out to be his wife's ex-fiance.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: A Gun Is Not a Gentleman
programme.sub-title: A Gun Is Not a Gentleman
programme.desc: Unable to come to terms, a U.S. senator and a Supreme Court justice agree to a duel.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Lion of Idaho
programme.desc: Attorney William E. Borah defends a woman charged with murder in Nampa, Idaho.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Debt
programme.desc: A friendship grows between a wounded bandit and a French-Canadian engineer who nurses him back to health.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Train and Lucy Tutaine
programme.desc: When her cow is killed by a train, Lucy Tutaine is outraged by the indifference to her financial loss.(n)

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: A heart-wrenching drama starring Academy Award Winners Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner. When Elliot is left to care for his granddaughter Eloise by himself, Eloise’s paternal grandmother seeks custody, drawing them into a long and uncertain battle.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.(n)

programme.title: The Silver Brumby
programme.desc: In the unforgiving wilderness of the Australian Alps, there roams a stallion like no other, the Silver Brumby. Now, one horseman sets off on an unforgettable adventure to capture the horse that according to legend, could never be tamed.(n)

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: A raven-haired enchantress, Cassie Nightingale, mysteriously moves into the local haunted mansion, 'Grey House', and seems to change her neighbors lives using a hint of magic causing many to think she’s a witch.(n)

programme.title: Sweet Talker
programme.desc: A sweet-talking con man (Bryan Brown) starts to turn his life around when he falls in love in this family-oriented comedy.(n)

programme.title: Keep The Aspidistra Flying
programme.desc: When successful advertiser, Gordon Comstock (Richard E. Grant), abruptly walks away from his career to pursue his dream of being a poet, his path is much more difficult than expected and soon financial problems begin to pile up.(n)

programme.title: The Steal
programme.desc: When villainous London bankers plunder desperately-needed money from the Third World, a female computer hacker is hired to get it back. A tale of kidnapping, computer fraud and Morris Minors.(n)

programme.title: Rockets Galore
programme.desc: Residents of a small island in the Atlantic resist their government's plan to make their home a missile base.(n)

programme.title: Ask a Policeman
programme.desc: Bumbling policemen Sergeant Samuel Dudfoot and his two constables find their jobs at risk when the Chief Constable considers disbanding their force. In their attempt to fabricate crimes to look useful, they find themselves involved in the real thing.(n)

programme.title: The Baby and the Battleship
programme.desc: While anchored off the Italian shore, two British sailors are forced to smuggle a baby aboard their ship.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: On the premiere episode of "Quantum Leap," Sam Beckett wakes up in 1956, disoriented, suffering from amnesia, but he has the awful realization that he does not belong there... Part 1 of 2.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam takes part in the Quantum Leap experiment which lands him in 1956 as a test pilot. With the help of his holographic "Observer", Sam learns that his fate is to "quantum leap" through time with the hope of returning to his own present. Part 2 of 2.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the persona of a womanizing college professor in 1972, encounters his lost love (Teri Hatcher) and attempts to reshape the past. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: The Right Hand of God - October 24, 1974
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) lands in 1974 as a young boxer caught between fight-fixing gangsters and hopeful nuns who now own his contract. With Dean Stockwell. Guest stars Guy Stockwell and Teri Copley.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: When Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes an attractive female secretary in 1961, he must deal with rampant sexism and his employer's lecherous advances. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: How the Tess Was Won - September 28, 1956
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) finds himself on a Texas ranch in 1956 as a submissive veterinarian in love with a tough rancher (Kari Lizer). With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Kali Part 2
programme.desc: After finding Will in a Dharavi warehouse just barely alive, Magnus, Kate and Ravi, rush him back to the Mumbai Sanctuary for emergency treatment.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Kali Part 3
programme.desc: The season three opener finds the Sanctuary team desperately trying to find a way to reach Kali to prevent catastrophic tidal waves from killing millions world.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Firewall
programme.desc: A mission goes dangerously sideways when Will slips up, putting his Sanctuary teammates in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Skin Deep (REDUX)
programme.desc: Callie's reunion with old friend Lena goes awry when a rival starhunter attempts to arrest Lena for murder. Percy and Marcus leave the ship to buy an anti-matter stabilizer, but the deal goes poorly and the two find themselves stranded in Io's Syn City.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Supermax Redux (REDUX)
programme.desc: While transporting Quigley, a prisoner who appears to be quite insane, the crew save the lives of an old nemesis and his associates. Max offers to share a stash of Onmium, a mineral rarer than diamonds and worth billions.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Ton and Allen duke it out with a local thrift store gang at a Brooklyn storage auction. The guys discover a classic arcade redemption game and a mid-century water cannon designed to fight towering infernos!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing
programme.desc: Allen and Ton compete with a notorious deep-pocketed bidder in Oxnard, CA, and score a vintage Coca-Cola vending machine, a vintage desk and a rare 1971 GMC truck.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Strat'ed for Cash
programme.desc: On a limited budget in the historic L.A. neighborhood of West Adams, Allen and Ton still win three lockers and find a Maui Blue Fender Stratocaster and a 1930s Schwinn bike.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.(n)
